RmUtility::Pose Struct Reference

Provides a standardized way of representing, accessing, and manipulating an object's pose, that is, its position on a Cartesian coordinate system and its heading. More...

Detailed Description

Provides a standardized way of representing, accessing, and manipulating an object's pose, that is, its position on a Cartesian coordinate system and its heading.

Pose Pose::operator+ (  const Pose &  addend  )  const
 

Returns the sum of two poses, where the x, y, and theta values of the addend are added to those of this Pose object.

The return theta will always be between [0..360).

Pose Pose::operator- (  const Pose &  subtrahend  )  const
 

Returns the difference between two poses, where the x, y, and theta values of the subtrahend are subtracted from those of this pose object.

The return theta will always be between [0..360).
